BulletEntry.description: This class is the data model of `BulletEntry`.
BulletEntry.title: BulletEntry

ClassicThemeOptions.description: This class is the data model of the theme options for the `classic` theme.

font.description: The font family of the CV. The default value is Source Sans 3.
font.title: Font

font_size.description: The font size of the CV. The default value is 10pt.
font_size.title: Font Size

page_size.description: The page size of the CV. It can be a4paper or letterpaper. The default value is letterpaper.
page_size.title: Page Size

color.description:
The primary color of the theme. 
The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value. The default value is rgb(0,79,144).
color.title: Primary Color

disable_external_link_icons.description: If this option is set to true, then the external link icons will not be shown next to the links. The default value is false.
disable_external_link_icons.title: Disable External Link Icons

disable_page_numbering.description: If this option is set to true, then the page numbering will not be shown. The default value is false.
disable_page_numbering.title: Disable Page Numbering

page_numbering_style.description:
The style of the page numbering. The following placeholders can be used:
- NAME: The name of the person
- PAGE_NUMBER: The current page number
- TOTAL_PAGES: The total number of pages
The default value is NAME - Page PAGE_NUMBER of TOTAL_PAGES.
page_numbering_style.title: Page Numbering Style

disable_last_updated_date.description: If this option is set to true, then the last updated date will not be shown in the header. The default value is false.
disable_last_updated_date.title: Disable Last Updated Date

last_updated_date_style.description:
The style of the last updated date. The following placeholder can be used:
- TODAY: Today's month and year (April 2024)
The default value is Last updated in TODAY.
last_updated_date_style.title: Last Updated Date Style

header_font_size.description: The font size of the header (the name of the person). The default value is 30 pt.
header_font_size.title: Header Font Size

text_alignment.description: The alignment of the text. The default value is justified.
text_alignment.title: Text Alignment

seperator_between_connections.description: The separator between the connections in the header. The default value is empty string.
seperator_between_connections.title: Seperator Between Connections

use_icons_for_connections.description: If this option is set to true, then icons will be used for the connections in the header. The default value is true.
use_icons_for_connections.title: Use Icons for Connections

margins.description: Page, section title, entry field, and highlights field margins.
margins.title: Margins

show_timespan_in.description: The time span will be shown in the date and location column in these sections. The input should be a list of section titles as strings (case-sensitive). The default value is an empty list, which means the time span will not be shown in any section.
show_timespan_in.title: Show Time Span in These Sections

ClassicThemeOptions.title: ClassicThemeOptions

CurriculumVitae.description: This class is the data model of the CV.

email.description: The email address of the person.
email.title: Email

phone.description: The phone number of the person.
phone.title: Phone

social_networks.description: The social networks of the person.
social_networks.title: Social Networks

CurriculumVitae.title: CurriculumVitae

EducationEntry.description: This class is the data model of `EducationEntry`.

date.description: The date field can be filled in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY formats or as an arbitrary string like "Fall 2023".
date.title: Date

start_date.description: The start date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format.
start_date.title: Start Date

end_date.description: The end date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format. If the event is still ongoing, then type "present" or provide only the start_date.
end_date.title: End Date

highlights.description: The highlights of the event as a list of strings.
highlights.title: Highlights

EducationEntry.title: EducationEntry

EngineeringresumesThemeOptions.description:
This class is the data model of the theme options for the `engineeringresumes`
theme.

font.description: The font family of the CV. The default value is Charter.
font.title: Font

font_size.description: The font size of the CV. The default value is 10pt.
font_size.title: Font Size

page_size.description: The page size of the CV. It can be a4paper or letterpaper. The default value is letterpaper.
page_size.title: Page Size

color.description:
The primary color of the theme. 
The color can be specified either with their [name](https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value. The default value is rgb(0,0,0).
color.title: Primary Color

disable_external_link_icons.description: If this option is set to true, then the external link icons will not be shown next to the links. The default value is true.
disable_external_link_icons.title: Disable External Link Icons

disable_page_numbering.description: If this option is set to true, then the page numbering will not be shown. The default value is true.
disable_page_numbering.title: Disable Page Numbering

page_numbering_style.description:
The style of the page numbering. The following placeholders can be used:
- NAME: The name of the person
- PAGE_NUMBER: The current page number
- TOTAL_PAGES: The total number of pages
The default value is NAME - Page PAGE_NUMBER of TOTAL_PAGES.
page_numbering_style.title: Page Numbering Style

disable_last_updated_date.description: If this option is set to true, then the last updated date will not be shown in the header. The default value is true.
disable_last_updated_date.title: Disable Last Updated Date

last_updated_date_style.description:
The style of the last updated date. The following placeholder can be used:
- TODAY: Today's month and year (April 2024)
The default value is Last updated in TODAY.
last_updated_date_style.title: Last Updated Date Style

header_font_size.description: The font size of the header (the name of the person). The default value is 25 pt.
header_font_size.title: Header Font Size

text_alignment.description: The alignment of the text. The default value is left-aligned.
text_alignment.title: Text Alignment

seperator_between_connections.description: The separator between the connections in the header. The default value is empty string.
seperator_between_connections.title: Seperator Between Connections

use_icons_for_connections.description: If this option is set to true, then icons will be used for the connections (like phone, email, and website). The default value is false.
use_icons_for_connections.title: Use Icons for Connections

margins.description: Page, section title, entry field, and highlights field margins.
margins.title: Margins

EngineeringresumesThemeOptions.title: EngineeringresumesThemeOptions

EntryAreaMargins.description: This class is a data model for the entry area margins.

left_and_right.description: The left margin of entry areas. The default value is 0.2 cm.
left_and_right.title: Left Margin

vertical_between.description: The vertical margin between entry areas. The default value is 0.2 cm.
vertical_between.title: Vertical Margin Between Entry Areas

date_and_location_width.description: The width of the date and location column. The default value is 4.5 cm.
date_and_location_width.title: Date and Location Column Width

EntryAreaMargins.title: EntryAreaMargins

EntryAreaMarginsForClassic.description: This class is a data model for the entry area margins.

left_and_right.description: The left margin of entry areas. The default value is 0.2 cm.
left_and_right.title: Left Margin

vertical_between.description: The vertical margin between entry areas. The default value is 0.2 cm.
vertical_between.title: Vertical Margin Between Entry Areas

date_and_location_width.description: The width of the date and location column. The default value is 4.5 cm.
date_and_location_width.title: Date and Location Column Width

education_degree_width.description: The width of the degree column in EducationEntry. The default value is 1 cm.
education_degree_width.title: Date and Location Column Width

EntryAreaMarginsForClassic.title: EntryAreaMarginsForClassic

EntryAreaMarginsForEngineeringresumes.description: This class is a data model for the entry area margins.

left_and_right.description: The left margin of entry areas. The default value is 0 cm.
left_and_right.title: Left Margin

vertical_between.description: The vertical margin between entry areas. The default value is 0.2 cm.
vertical_between.title: Vertical Margin Between Entry Areas

date_and_location_width.description: The width of the date and location column. The default value is 4.5 cm.
date_and_location_width.title: Date and Location Column Width

EntryAreaMarginsForEngineeringresumes.title: EntryAreaMarginsForEngineeringresumes

ExperienceEntry.description: This class is the data model of `ExperienceEntry`.

date.description: The date field can be filled in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY formats or as an arbitrary string like "Fall 2023".
date.title: Date

start_date.description: The start date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format.
start_date.title: Start Date

end_date.description: The end date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format. If the event is still ongoing, then type "present" or provide only the start_date.
end_date.title: End Date

highlights.description: The highlights of the event as a list of strings.
highlights.title: Highlights

ExperienceEntry.title: ExperienceEntry

HeaderMargins.description: This class is a data model for the header margins.

vertical_between_name_and_connections.description: The vertical margin between the name of the person and the connections. The default value is 0.3 cm.
vertical_between_name_and_connections.title: Vertical Margin Between the Name and Connections

bottom.description: The bottom margin of the header, i.e., the vertical margin between the connections and the first section title. The default value is 0.3 cm.
bottom.title: Bottom Margin

horizontal_between_connections.description: The space between the connections (like phone, email, and website). The default value is 0.5 cm.
horizontal_between_connections.title: Space Between Connections

HeaderMargins.title: HeaderMargins

HeaderMarginsForEngineeringresumes.description: This class is a data model for the header margins.

vertical_between_name_and_connections.description: The vertical margin between the name of the person and the connections. The default value is 5 pt.
vertical_between_name_and_connections.title: Vertical Margin Between the Name and Connections

bottom.description: The bottom margin of the header, i.e., the vertical margin between the connections and the first section title. The default value is 5 pt.
bottom.title: Bottom Margin

horizontal_between_connections.description: The space between the connections (like phone, email, and website). The default value is 20 pt.
horizontal_between_connections.title: Space Between Connections

HeaderMarginsForEngineeringresumes.title: HeaderMarginsForEngineeringresumes

HighlightsAreaMargins.description: This class is a data model for the highlights area margins.

top.description: The top margin of highlights areas. The default value is 0.10 cm.
top.title: Top Margin

left.description: The left margin of highlights areas. The default value is 0.4 cm.
left.title: Left Margin

vertical_between_bullet_points.description: The vertical margin between bullet points. The default value is 0.10 cm.
vertical_between_bullet_points.title: Vertical Margin Between Bullet Points

HighlightsAreaMargins.title: HighlightsAreaMargins

HighlightsAreaMarginsForEngineeringresum.description: This class is a data model for the highlights area margins.

top.description: The top margin of highlights areas. The default value is 0.10 cm.
top.title: Top Margin

left.description: The left margin of highlights areas. The default value is 0 cm.
left.title: Left Margin

vertical_between_bullet_points.description: The vertical margin between bullet points. The default value is 0.10 cm.
vertical_between_bullet_points.title: Vertical Margin Between Bullet Points

HighlightsAreaMarginsForEngineeringresum.title: HighlightsAreaMarginsForEngineeringresumes

LocaleCatalog.description:
This class is the data model of the locale catalog. The values of each field
updates the `locale_catalog` dictionary.

month.description: Translation of the word "month" in the locale.
month.title: Translation of "Month"

months.description: Translation of the word "months" in the locale.
months.title: Translation of "Months"

year.description: Translation of the word "year" in the locale.
year.title: Translation of "Year"

years.description: Translation of the word "years" in the locale.
years.title: Translation of "Years"

present.description: Translation of the word "present" in the locale.
present.title: Translation of "Present"

to.description: The word or character used to indicate a range in the locale (e.g., "2020 - 2021").
to.title: Translation of "To"

abbreviations_for_months.description: Abbreviations of the months in the locale.
abbreviations_for_months.title: Abbreviations of Months

LocaleCatalog.title: LocaleCatalog

Margins.description: This class is a data model for the margins.
Margins.title: Margins

MarginsForClassic.description: This class is a data model for the margins.
MarginsForClassic.title: MarginsForClassic

MarginsForEngineeringresumes.description: This class is a data model for the margins.
MarginsForEngineeringresumes.title: MarginsForEngineeringresumes

ModerncvThemeOptions.description: This class is the data model of the theme options for the `moderncv` theme.

font_size.description: The font size of the CV. The default value is "10pt".
font_size.title: Font Size

page_size.description: The page size of the CV. The default value is "letterpaper".
page_size.title: Page Size

color.description: The primary color of the CV. The default value is "blue".
color.title: Primary Color

date_width.description: The width of the date column. The default value is "3.8 cm".
date_width.title: Date and Location Column Width

content_scale.description: The scale of the content with respect to the page size. The default value is "0.75".
content_scale.title: Content Scale

show_only_years.description: If "True", only the years will be shown in the date column. The default value is "False".
show_only_years.title: Show Only Years

disable_page_numbers.description: If "True", the page numbers will be disabled. The default value is "False".
disable_page_numbers.title: Disable Page Numbers

ModerncvThemeOptions.title: ModerncvThemeOptions

NormalEntry.description: This class is the data model of `NormalEntry`.

date.description: The date field can be filled in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY formats or as an arbitrary string like "Fall 2023".
date.title: Date

start_date.description: The start date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format.
start_date.title: Start Date

end_date.description: The end date of the event in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY format. If the event is still ongoing, then type "present" or provide only the start_date.
end_date.title: End Date

highlights.description: The highlights of the event as a list of strings.
highlights.title: Highlights

NormalEntry.title: NormalEntry

OneLineEntry.description: This class is the data model of `OneLineEntry`.
OneLineEntry.title: OneLineEntry

PageMargins.description: This class is a data model for the page margins.

top.description: The top margin of the page with units. The default value is 2 cm.
top.title: Top Margin

bottom.description: The bottom margin of the page with units. The default value is 2 cm.
bottom.title: Bottom Margin

left.description: The left margin of the page with units. The default value is 2 cm.
left.title: Left Margin

right.description: The right margin of the page with units. The default value is 2 cm.
right.title: Right Margin

PageMargins.title: PageMargins

PublicationEntry.description: This class is the data model of `PublicationEntry`.

authors.description: The authors of the publication in order as a list of strings.
authors.title: Authors

url.description: The URL of the publication. If DOI is provided, it will be ignored.
url.title: URL

date.description: The date field can be filled in YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, or YYYY formats or as an arbitrary string like "Fall 2023".
date.title: Date

PublicationEntry.title: PublicationEntry

Sb2novThemeOptions.description: This class is the data model of the theme options for the `sb2nov` theme.

font.description: The font family of the CV. The default value is Latin Modern Serif.
font.title: Font

font_size.description: The font size of the CV. The default value is 10pt.
font_size.title: Font Size

page_size.description: The page size of the CV. It can be a4paper or letterpaper. The default value is letterpaper.
page_size.title: Page Size

color.description:
The primary color of the theme. 
The color can be specified either with their name (https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/types.html#ColorKeywords), hexadecimal value, RGB value, or HSL value. The default value is rgb(0,79,144).
color.title: Primary Color

disable_external_link_icons.description: If this option is set to true, then the external link icons will not be shown next to the links. The default value is false.
disable_external_link_icons.title: Disable External Link Icons

disable_page_numbering.description: If this option is set to true, then the page numbering will not be shown. The default value is false.
disable_page_numbering.title: Disable Page Numbering

page_numbering_style.description:
The style of the page numbering. The following placeholders can be used:
- NAME: The name of the person
- PAGE_NUMBER: The current page number
- TOTAL_PAGES: The total number of pages
The default value is NAME - Page PAGE_NUMBER of TOTAL_PAGES.
page_numbering_style.title: Page Numbering Style

disable_last_updated_date.description: If this option is set to true, then the last updated date will not be shown in the header. The default value is false.
disable_last_updated_date.title: Disable Last Updated Date

last_updated_date_style.description:
The style of the last updated date. The following placeholder can be used:
- TODAY: Today's month and year (April 2024)
The default value is Last updated in TODAY.
last_updated_date_style.title: Last Updated Date Style

header_font_size.description: The font size of the header (the name of the person). The default value is 24 pt. Unfortunately, sb2nov does not support font sizes bigger than 24 pt.
header_font_size.title: Header Font Size

text_alignment.description: The alignment of the text. The default value is justified.
text_alignment.title: Text Alignment

seperator_between_connections.description: The separator between the connections in the header. The default value is empty string.
seperator_between_connections.title: Seperator Between Connections

use_icons_for_connections.description: If this option is set to true, then icons will be used for the connections in the header. The default value is true.
use_icons_for_connections.title: Use Icons for Connections

margins.description: Page, section title, entry field, and highlights field margins.
margins.title: Margins

Sb2novThemeOptions.title: Sb2novThemeOptions

SectionTitleMargins.description: This class is a data model for the section title margins.

top.description: The top margin of section titles. The default value is 0.3 cm.
top.title: Top Margin

bottom.description: The bottom margin of section titles. The default value is 0.3 cm.
bottom.title: Bottom Margin

SectionTitleMargins.title: SectionTitleMargins

SocialNetwork.description: This class is the data model of a social network.

username.description: The username of the social network. The link will be generated.
username.title: Username

SocialNetwork.title: SocialNetwork

design.description: The design information of the CV. The default is the classic theme.
design.title: Design

locale_catalog.description: The locale catalog of the CV to allow the support of multiple languages.
locale_catalog.title: Locale Catalog
